name: Petra (demo version)
description:
A demo version for a game i'm making. It's currently only avaible for Windows

Petra is an top-down puzzle adventure game where you play as an archeologist on a mission to find treasures and discover history of ancient kingdom of Lorenest.

In the demo there is only the first location of a game, more will be added in the future. 

Please, leave yoir feedback, as i want to make the game as good as possible.

Also, you can't open menu with Ctrl, even tho the game tells you to.

There are 6 treasure to collect in this demo, even tho the interface states otherwise.
